course_description: Required for EALC Majors and East Asian Studies Majors and Minors. An interdisciplinary course that introduces students to major topics and methodologies in East Asian Studies, with an emphasis on writing, research, and critical thinking. Themes include history, literature, religion, and the arts.
schedule_location: MW 11:30am-12:45pm in New Psyc Bldg 235 (36 Eagle Ro
